title: Boston Bounces Back, Can Luka Carry The Mavs Again?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to discuss the Celtics making a bounce back statement in Game 2 against Miami, Boston’s evolution over the course of the season, why the Heat need Lowry, the similarities between Ime Udoka and Jason Kidd, if Luka can carry the Mavs again and the prolific nature of this Warriors team. Plus, a league executive who may be on the move.

itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Celtics Make A Statement, Can Luka Overcome The Warriors Weapons?
